welcome_message_body: Welcome to Irapuato, Mexico! Known for its picturesque plazas, delicious strawberries, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cristalita
restaurants.description: Cristalita is a deli located in Irapuato.
restaurants.address: Alvaro obregon 354, centro (Entre 20 de Noviembre y Matamoros Sur), 38000 Irapuato, Guanajuato

restaurants.name: Taquería Los Fundadores
restaurants.description: Taquería Los Fundadores is a taco restaurant located in Irapuato.

restaurants.name: La Salamandra Irapuato
restaurants.description: La Salamandra Irapuato is a diner located in Irapuato.

restaurants.name: Tacos Furber
restaurants.description: Tacos Furber is a taco restaurant located in Irapuato.

restaurants.name: Tostadas Y Mariscos Rafa
restaurants.description: Tostadas Y Mariscos Rafa is a seafood restaurant located in Irapuato.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Celaya Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Celaya Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
